titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that certified public accountants and enrolled agents may represent taxpayers in certain Tax Court cases involving $10,000 or less.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/1/1987--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certified public accountants and enrolled agents authorized to practice before the Internal Revenue Service to represent taxpayers in certain Tax Court cases involving $10,000 or less.
